aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.description: Hi! I'm Ezequiel Garibotto, a passionate software developer with experience in web and mobile development. I love creating innovative solutions and learning new technologies.

projectDescriptions.m04-adivina-numero-secreto: 'Guess the secret number' - A basic HTML, CSS, and JavaScript project.
projectDescriptions.m04-play-html-css: A very basic HTML & CSS project with simple design and animations.
projectDescriptions.m08-p4-maps-app: CRUD app for map markers with Firebase integration for user data and photos.
projectDescriptions.trivial-app-jetpack-compose: A trivia app with customizable game settings like difficulty, themes, and categories.
projectDescriptions.zomb: Infinite horizontal scroller retro game with enemies, collisions, and more.
projectDescriptions.competitive-programming: Solved problems on JO-EL and AceptaElReto to prepare for the ProgramaMe 2024 contest.
projectDescriptions.neutral-news: A news aggregation app that provides unbiased and neutral news summaries.
projectDescriptions.eulix: Android development of an app designed to recommend content (movies, series) based on user personality, mood, and preferences.
